citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:25 pm on
9/16/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by calling and texting the registrant and knocking on
the registrant's door. The inspector reached the registrant but the registrant was not available to meet with the inspector.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:25 pm on 
9/16/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by calling and texting the registrant and knocking on 
the registrant's door. The inspector reached the registrant but the registrant was not available to meet with the inspector. 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
